description: This file defines an abstract generic class BaseMapper for converting between entity objects and Data Transfer Objects (DTOs). It provides abstract methods to convert individual objects and concrete methods to convert collections of objects.

classes.name: BaseMapper
classes.description: An abstract class that provides generic conversion methods between entity and DTO objects, supporting conversion of individual objects and collections.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Abstract method to convert a DTO to an entity, with optional additional arguments.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Abstract method to convert an entity to a DTO, with optional additional arguments.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Converts a collection of DTOs to entities by mapping each DTO using convertToEntity.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Converts a collection of entities to DTOs by mapping each entity using convertToDto.

methods.name: convertToEntityList
methods.description: Converts a collection of DTOs to a List of entities.

methods.name: convertToDtoList
methods.description: Converts a collection of entities to a List of DTOs.

methods.name: convertToEntitySet
methods.description: Converts a collection of DTOs to a Set of entities.

methods.name: convertToDtoSet
methods.description: Converts a collection of entities to a Set of DTOs.
